
######################################

######################################


#leader_trait_adaptable_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_adaptable_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_adaptable }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_adaptable_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_adaptable_2
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {

            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
		}
    }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_righteous }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_righteous_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_righteous_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_righteous_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_righteous_2
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_righteous_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
		}
    }
}

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_scrapper_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_scrapper_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_scrapper }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    }

            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }

		}
    }

xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_space_miner_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_space_miner_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_space_miner_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_space_miner }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_space_miner_3 }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_space_miner_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_space_miner_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_space_miner_3
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_space_miner_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
		}
    }
}


#leader_trait_efficient #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_efficient_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_efficient } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_efficient
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_governor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_efficient }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_efficient }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_efficient_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_efficient }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_efficient
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_efficient }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
}


#leader_trait_galvanizer #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_galvanizer_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_galvanizer } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_galvanizer
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_governor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_galvanizer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_galvanizer }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_galvanizer_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_galvanizer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_galvanizer
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_galvanizer }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
}


#leader_trait_intemporal #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_intemporal_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intemporal } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_intemporal
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_intemporal }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_intemporal }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_intemporal_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_intemporal }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_intemporal
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_intemporal }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
}


#leader_trait_mediator #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_mediator_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_mediator } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_mediator
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_mediator }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_mediator }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_mediator_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_mediator }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_mediator
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_mediator }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
}


#leader_trait_urbanist #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_urbanist_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_urbanist } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_urbanist
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_governor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_urbanist }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_urbanist }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_urbanist_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_urbanist }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_urbanist
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_urbanist }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
}


#leader_trait_utopian_idealist #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_utopian_idealist_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_utopian_idealist } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_utopian_idealist
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_governor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_utopian_idealist }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_utopian_idealist }
		hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_utopian_idealist_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_utopian_idealist }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_utopian_idealist
		hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_utopian_idealist }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
		}
    }
}
